original: 在大哥的領導下，我們的城池已經到達當階段的頂峰了，需要大哥下達擴建指令後方可繼續經營，同時也會增加新的兵種！
text: Under the leadership of the big brother, our city has reached the peak of the current stage. We need to give the expansion order from the big brother before we can continue to operate, and at the same time we will add new troops!
